text: We report here the first complete circularly closed genome sequence of Enterococcus thailandicus strain a523 isolated from raw urban sewage. This genome contains 2,646,250 bp with a G+C content of 36.8%, 2,499 genes, 2,370 protein-coding sequences, 6 rRNA operons, 65 tRNAs, and 6 clustered regularly interspaced short palindromic repeat arrays.
title: Complete Genome Sequence of Enterococcus thailandicus Strain a523 Isolated from Urban Raw Sewage.
